original_text: And when he was twelve years old, they went up according to custom.
korean_text: 예수께서 열두 살 되었을 때에 그들이 이 절기의 관례를 따라 올라갔다가

sentences.original_text: And when he was twelve years old,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 열두 살이 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: they went up according to custom.
